Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $69.99 - $49.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:30:48 UTC – Details)


Amazfit Bip 3 pro–the 2022 upgraded smartwatch that guides you toward a healthier, more active, more connected life. The watch packs a 1.69″ super-sized color screen into its super slim and light body for a clear, exquisite viewing experience. It adds 4 Satellite Positioning Systems to provide faster, more accurate positioning. Powerful battery to deliver up to 14 days of battery life. Built-in 60+ sports modes and Target Pace function, making your exercise at a higher level. With a powerful Water-resistance grade of 5 ATM, you can swim with your Bip 3 Pro without worry. Get clear and actionable insights into your health with SpO2 measurement, 24/7 heart rate monitoring, sleep analysis, stress detection, and menstrual cycle tracking. Compatible with Android 7.0 and above & IOS 12.0 and above device.
【Big on Screen, Big on Style】Immerse yourself in the 1.69″ super-large and colorful HD display, and see all your incoming text and calls in awesome, expansive quality. Express more of yourself with 50 plus watch faces and editable watch faces & widgets – or customize with your own photos..Water resistance depth:50 meters
【Explore a Big Open World】The Amazfit Bip 3 Pro smart watch supports 4 satellite positioning systems to help you track your moves through the great outdoors with high precision.
【Big on Power】Got a trip coming up? Unplug yourself for up to two weeks with typical usage. The Bip 3 Pro smartwatch packs a powerful battery into its super slim and light body, so you can pack something more fun than a charger into your case.
【Big on Health】It’s the ultimate device for a healthier, more active life that can provide blood-oxygen saturation measurement, monitoring of heart rate all day & abnormal heart rate warnings, stress levels & sleep tracking, as well as recording female menstrual period.
【Smash Bigger Workout Goals】The Bip 3 Pro fitness watch has 60 plus sports modes, allowing you to get data for all your favorite sports, like walking, running and cycling, as well as more freeform workouts like strength training, yoga, and free training.
【Take a Deep Dip with Bip】IP68 drowning your ambition? With its water-resistance grade of 5 ATM, you can swim with your Bip 3 Pro without worry. The watch can even track your activity data with its Open Water Swimming sports mode.



Big on Action




4satellite positioning systems

The Amazfit Bip 3 Pro supports 4 satellite positioning systems to help you track your moves through the great outdoors with high-precision.

60+ Sports Modes

Get data for all your favorite sports, like indoor and outdoor walking, running and cycling, as well as more freeform workouts like strength training, yoga, and free training. Take your cardio game to the next level with the watch’s Target Pace function, which lets you set and crush your pace goals.

5 ATM water-Resistance

IP68 drowning your ambition? With its water-resistance grade of 5 ATM, you can swim with your Bip3 Pro, without worry. The watch can even track your activity data with its Open Water Swimming sports mode.

Read more

Big on Health




Go Higher with SpO2 Measurement

Feeling worn out? Or adventuring up to higher altitudes? Be smart and use the watch to easily measure your blood-oxygen saturation in as quick as 25 seconds, to quickly understand your physical state.

Follow Your Heart All Day

Keep an eye on the most important muscle in your body. The watch can monitor your heart rate all day, and let you know if it becomes abnormally elevated. You can even check if you’re working out in your goal heart rate zone.

Dream Big, Dream Bip

Follow your dreams through the light, deep and REM sleep stages. The Amazfit Bip 3 Pro can monitor your sleep quality8, so you can rest well enough to keep making the fitness gains you want.

  • Monitor Sleep Stages & Daytime Naps
  • Track Sleep Breathing Quality
  • Get a Sleep Score in the Zepp App

Read more

Big on Versatility




Express More of Yourself

Immerse yourself in the super-large and colorful HD display and express more of yourself with 50+ watch faces and editable watch faces & widgets – or customize with your own photos.

A Smart Partner for Your Phone

Synchronize it with your phone get SMS/phone call/app notifications and control the music playback/ camera of your phone, right on your wrist. The smart watch will also offer Sedentary Reminders, Do Not Disturb, To-Do List, and weather forecast functions, as well as enabling the setting of alarms and stopwatches.

Connect to the Zepp App

The ZeppApp on your phone conducts health and exercise data display and analysis, features a watch face store, provides system updates for your watch, and facilitates smart device management.

Read more

4.5
Price: $69.99 - $49.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:30:48 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 10:02:06 UTC – Details)

From the brand

LISEN electronic accessory stand helps us break the bad habit of looking down at the phone for a long time

Most comfortable height for the neck, shoulders and neck designed by German scientists according to ergonomics
Preserving a head-up or slightly upward gaze while using electronic devices can successfully avoid development of “text neck”
This new phone stand that is higher than the triangular phone base will be your most valuable product

LISEN New Stand Recommend

TALLER AND MORE PHOTOGENIC STAND, HELP TO CORRECT THE “TEXT NECK”: This cell phone stand holder is in accordance with ergonomic design. Providing you comfortable viewing angle which helps to fix your posture and reduce neck & back strain. The height can be easily adjusted between 7.1in-8.5in(1.4in adjustable range), the angle is adjustable between 5°~85°
USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: [No bent & tangling & tip over worries] when using while charging. Due to bent cable, the low phone dock maybe fall over. LISEN stylish adjustable phone holder for desk has a reserved charging hole design, supports cable management, [No bent & tangling & tip over worries]. This phone pad will not cover the subtitle when you watch the video
WEIGHTED ANTI-SLIP BASE: This cell phone stand for desk is equipped with a weighted base and an aluminum alloy rod. Therefore, this iPhone stand holder is stable enough to support all smartphones or small tablets, such as 2021 iPad Mini, iPhone 14 pro max 13 Pro/13 Mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 Mini/iPhone 11/11 Pro/Max/X/MAX/XR/8/8P, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, Note 10/9/8/Plus, S10/S9/S8, Kindel, Switch, iPad Mini,iPad Air, etc.We recommend the most stable compatible device size is 4-10 inchs
ANTI-SLIP DESIGN: The pad back and the bottom of this cell phone stand are fully covered by anti-skid silicone, which LISEN iPad stand holder can provide maximum protection for your device from any scratches and slides, grips friendly
WE CARE ABOUT YOU: If the product arrives broken, or get broken within 365 days, please directly contact LISEN for satisfied solution. Any other problem like could not tighten the screw, please also contact us. We sincerely care about every customer’s shopping experience! (Product including: phone stand*1, screw*1, hexagon screwdriver*1, specification*1)






LISEN electronic Accessories stand help to save the bad habit that we are spending more and more time bow head to looking on our mobile phones

  • Choosing LISEN electronic accessories stand, the most suitable height designed by German scientists based on ergonomic shoulder and neck
  • As long as you insist on using it for 1 hour a day, Keep hold head looking up at electronic devices
  • Can effectively alleviate the formation of our “text neck”, help our family enjoy the joy of playing with electronic devices while staying healthy
  • This new style mobile electronic stand will be your most valuable product, higher than triangular cell phone dock, Save you from the bad habit of head down playing phone!

Questions & Answers

Q1: Is this cell phone stands stable for a big phone and tablets?

Answer: Yes. this phone holder can support all cell phones. In addition, LISEN iPhone stand for desk can also stably adapt to small tablets less than 10 inchs, like 2021 iPad mini etc.

Q2: How tall is this cell phone stand holder?

Answer: The height of this desk phone stand is 1.4 inches adjustable, is flush with the face or slightly higher, so that you can be more calm and elegant during video calls.




Thoughtful Storage Base

Aesthetics of desk fashion With a storage base design, this iPhone stand holder can help to organize small things, such as airphones, rings, clips to avoid losing them.

Cable Organizer & Charging Hole

Featured with reserved charging hole and cable organizer circle, this cell phone holder stand is convenient for charging, and make your desk neat and tidy. No worry with cable tangling.

Full Covered Silicone Pad

Fully covered by soft silicone pad (back and feet), it can protect devices from scratch while 4 to 10 inch devices sitting comfortably. And it can support up to 0.53 inch thick phones with case.

Read more

item.title: andobil Car Phone Holder Mount [2022 Upgraded] Smartphone Air Vent Holder Easy Clamp Hands-Free Compatible with iPhone 11 12 13 14 Pro Max 6 7 8 X XR XS SE Samsung Galaxy S22/S21/S20+/S10/S9/Note 20

(as of Nov 30,2022 09:46:15 UTC – Details)



[2022 Upgraded Newest Version] It is the first one within the market that adapts the aviation material “PTFE”. With the metal vent clip [stronger & tighter]. Screw the clamp and the rubber clip hook will catch one of the car air vent blades tightly, even if you hit a bump or a sharper turn. So this vent phone holder could work well for you in extremely Driving environments. – Never Broke & Super Stable
[One Handed Operation & Drive without Distracting] Andobil design engineers upgraded the switch button, which not only made it easier to press it, but also made it quick to open the arm for only 0.1S. Mount or remove your phone in seconds with the patented Easy Clamp. – Easy to Use
[Easy to Adjust & Multiple Viewing Angle] This car mount for phone has a highly flexible ball-joint 360° rotation that provides infinite viewing angles. The phone car mount allows quick switching between vertically and landscape view .Position your phone at the perfect angle to enjoy a more relaxed and safer drive. – Best Driving Angle
[Adjustable Foot Design, Universal Compatibility ] – Andobil product manager designed adjustable foot of car phone holders. Avoid some cell phone power or volume button will be squeezed by the clamp arm. Meanwhile, the adjust foot improve the compatibility making this car cell phone holder fit for all smartphones. BTW, You don’t need to remove your thick case while using this phone holder car. – Big Phones & Thick Case Friendly
[Andobil Worry-Free Vouchsafing] – ANDOBIL vent phone holder for car always provide 24-month of worranty-support. – 12 hours quick response service

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 09:46:15 UTC – Details)

【Upgrade 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Station】Wireless Charging Station for Apple products,Saves your costs.Fast 3 in 1 charging station is equal to one charging station for iWatch, one Phone charging stand, 1 charging dock for AirPods. Wide compatibility to cover all IOS devices, Compatible with iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/13 mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 mini/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS/XR/XS MAX/X/8/8Plus & iWatch SE/6/5/4/3/2 & AirPods Pro/3/2/1. A must device for apple fans.
【Simplify Charging,Simplified Life】Only need one cable to charge for iphone, apple watch and airpods simultaneously, bring you an effortless charging experience, no more tangled cords trouble.Also, easy to find the “sweet spot” to charge, just simply place your phone on the stand and this wireless charger stand will do the rest. The Charging station for multiple devices apple is very suitable as a Christmas gift,Thanksgiving gift or birthday gift for friends.
【Intelligent Protection&Sleep Friendly Charging Pad】Our wireless charging stand with lightweight design, space saving,base with anti-slip silicone design so that the charger will not move or flip, to ensure that your phone is protected when charging; Besides, features a blue LED indicator when charging. If place this on nightstand, the blue light is a soft and not dazzing, virtually won’t lights up the entire room, no need to worry that it will prevent your sleep from being affected.
【What You Will Get】Our package includes 1* Wireless Charger iPhone,1*18W wall adapter,1*USB-C Charging Cable,1*User Manual,Worry-free 24-Month Warranty.One device allows you to have a clean desk and a beautiful smile,Please rest assured of the quality of our products that every product we send to you has gone through a series of quality inspection procedures. if you have any question on this wireless iphone charger, please contact us we will offer you a best solution within 24 hours.

Night shooting function: specially designed iPhone 14 Plus 6.7 Inch camera lens protective film.The camera lens protector adopts the new technology of “seamless” integration of augmented reality, with light transmittance and night shooting function, without the need to design the flash hole position, when the flash is turned on at night, the original quality of photos and videos can be restored.
It is 100% brand new,Precise laser cut tempered glass, exquisitely polished,0.33mm ultra-thin tempered glass screen protector maintains the original response sensitivity and touch, bringing you a good touch experience.
Easiest Installation – Please watch our installation video tutorial before installation.Removing dust and aligning it properly before actual installation,no worrying about bubbles,enjoy your screen as if it wasn’t there.
99.99% High-definition clear hydrophobic and oleophobic screen coating protects against sweat and oil residue from fingerprints,and enhance the visibility of the screen.

35 RGB + 3 Normal Color Modes: Selfie ring light has 3 conventional lighting(warm light/natural light/cool light)35 RGB colors modes(6 monochrome static + 29 dynamic modes)you can freely switch between 38 color modes. LED ring light is manufactured by ultrasonic welding, sturdy and durable. Lampshade with curved design, soft lighting, bright and transparent, without black spots and shadows.
Exclusive Stepless Speed Regulation & Dimming : Light ring uses press switch control design, can steplessly adjust the speed of light in RGB dynamic mode or steplessly adjust cool light/natural light/warm light in conventional lighting mode. In two modes to adjust the brightness steplessly(1%~100%),if you are not sure, please refer to the picture or user manual.
Patented High Quality Tripod: The ring light tripod has obtained related patents,max height of tripod is 62”, and the overall height can reach 72”. Tripod with ring light compared with other tripods,made of superior aluminum alloy, stable and durable, smaller footprint, only takes 1 second to lock the tripod,easy to use. We are equipped with 1 phone holders, the largest phone holder can be stretched to 3.3″, suitable for all kinds of cell phones.
Best Gifts & Wide Applicability : The ring light with stand and phone holder suitable for makeup, photography, painting, dancing, taking pictures, live stream or acting as fill light, floor lamp, zoom light. The top screw thread of the tripod is 1/4”, can be used as a camera tripod.
USB Ports Power Supply: Ring light with stand needs USB port for power supply, can be used with devices that support USB ports, We recommend using an adapter or wall outlet that outputs 5V/3A current so that the Weilisi light can work at maximum power mode.
Bluetooth Camera Remote: The halo light ring with stand comes with bluetooth camera remote control,you can take pictures or video from a distance,compatible with iOS and Android.We provide 6 months free after-sale replacement service,if you have any questions, please contact us.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $26.99 - $22.29
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:14:40 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Since its inception in 2013, SHOWPIN has been synonymous with quality, innovation, efficiency and value.

As a manufacturer of professional repair tools, we integrate R&D, manufacturing and sales, are committed to designing and manufacturing product that meet our customers’ needs and provide them with reliable products. Our product sold all over North America, Japan, Europe.

Our thinking: bring small but beautiful changes to life through repair.

Precision Screwdriver Set

Household & Electronics Repair

Mini screwdriver set

Make it easy to repair

【Powerful Functions】122 in 1 precision screwdriver set contains 98 screwdriver bits, 3TorxTR screwdriver bits and 21 auxiliary tools, such as screwdriver handle, flexible shaft, extension rod, magnetizer, magnetic pad, cleaning brush etc. Own this toolkit, you can replace the battery, screen and other parts of the smartphone, tablet, laptop, and upgrade the hard disk and performance of the computer and PC, disassemble and repair PS4, Xbox and other game consoles, repair drones, cameras, etc.
【Practical Repair Tool】This electronic screwdriver set is professionally designed to maximize your repair ability. The screwdriver handle is ergonomically designed, with non-slip particles outside, easy to exert force and rotate smoothly; the 4.56 inch alloy steel extension rod has high hardness, not easy to bend, suitable for narrow gaps; 5.11 inch flexible shaft is composed of CRV springs , which can be bent 180° and rotated 360°, helping you easily deal with complex disassembly environments.
【Quality First】The screwdriver bits in this laptop repair tool kit are made of Cr-V Steel, after high temperature treatment process, the hardness can reach 60HRC, stronger and not easy to damage, suitable for long-term use for repairing Electronics. This computer repair kit is equipped with spare bits for frequently used models( such as phillips, slot, tri-point) to avoid the need to find a new bit or replace a new screwdriver set if the bit is lost or damaged.
【With Professional Storage Case and Magnetizer】This computer tool kit comes with a shockproof plastic storage box, each screwdriver bit is well placed in the corresponding slot, easy to find and store. The included magnetizer can easily enhance the magnetic properties of the screwdriver bit. The 5.7*3.3 inch magnetic pad can absorb small screws and tiny metal parts, no worry about losing screws, or damage electronic components due to strong magnetism.
【Excellent Service】This screwdriver repair kit provides a 90-day refund and lifetime warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with the best solution within 24 hours. This screwdriver set is designed for disassembled and installation, even an amateur can easily repair electronic devices, making it a great Christmas gift for your husband, father, son or friend, bring them the surprise and fun of maintenance.


Premium Bits

These bits are precisely CNC machined, manufactured from high quality chrome vanadium steel that reduce rust, corrosion and abrasions giving you exact fit and long lasting service.

Precision Screwdriver Set

101 Screwdriver Bits and 21 Repair Tools

21 Repair Tools：Plastic Opening Tools, ESD Tweezers, SIM Card Ejector Pin, LCD Suction Cup, Triangle Opening Pry Tool, Plastic Spudgers, Magnetizing and Demagnetizing Tool and etc.

  • Computers and iMac
  • Laptops and Macbook
  • Tablet and iPads
  • iPhone and Android Phones
  • Game Consoles
  • Home Appliances
  • And More…

Read more

Pozidriv PZ000, PZ00, PZ0, PZ1, PZ2

Special Type S2 TorxTR: T6H,T8H,T10H, MID: 2.5, PH2, SIM: 0.8, Mini Torx:MT3.8,MT4.5

Product Description

Smart watch with text and call

Women’s smart watch contains many daily useful tools. For example, Bluetooth calls, smart notifications, breath training, music control, camera control, do not disturb mode, stopwatch, weather, flashlight.

【Call Notifications & Dialing】Smart watches for women includes more practical functions, Fitness Tracker (Pedometer, Calories, Distance), Heart Rate Monitor, Blood Pressure, 8 Sports Modes, Sleep Monitor, Blood Oxygen , Call Notifications & Phone calls, SMS and APP Messages , Music and Camera Control, Brightness Adjustment, Weather Display, Sedentary Reminder, Alarm Clock, Stopwatch.
【 1.72″ HD IPS Screen 】Smart watch for android phones uses 2.5D full-touch 1.72-inch color screen with 240*285 high-definition resolution, which makes every data screen clear and flexible. The ultra-thin frame gives you a more open visual experience. Custom dial design, You can change your favorite picture as a watch face with one click .（Specially equipped with an additional pink silicone strap.）
【Accurate Activity Tracker Watch & 8 Sport Modes】Fitness watch for women compatible with iphone track your steps,calories,heart rate,sleep stages,Blood Pressure,oxygen;smart watch supports 8 sports modes:walking,running,bicycle,swimming ,badminton,basketball,football,rope skipping to give you more detailed insights into your whole day activities; IP68 waterproof, you can wear it when swimming and record various data (Can not wear in hot shower).
【SMART WATCH FOR ANDROID PHONES】Compatible with most iOS 8.0 & Android 5.1 & Bluetooth 4.0 above. Download and install the Free “DA FIT” APP, connecting this womens smart watch in your phone, you can receive notifications of the calendar, incoming calls, SNS (Messenger, WhatsApp, Skype, etc) and preview messages. It will never let you miss any important things( Can not reply message). We offer sincere service within 7 x 24hrs to meet your satisfaction.
【Super Long Battery Life 】Android smart watch for women men equipped with a 200 mAh large capacity battery and can be used 7-15 days If fully charge (depends on individual usage) smart watch with text and call
